NCRTC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Assistant Manager Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 16:17 IST
 National Capital Region Regional Transport Corporation Limited
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 68,189 to 68,189




FOLLOW

The National Capital Region Transport Corporation (NCRTC) has released the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Diploma in Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

NCRTC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Assistant Manager 	01	Diploma in Electrical Engineering

Age Limit for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 65 years.

Selection Process for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 68,180 / per month.

Application fee for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NCRTC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Assistant Manager Jobs 2025. 
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your mobile number and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Pay the application fee (if applicable).
Submit the application form and note down the application number for further reference.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	13-08-2025
Last Date of Application	13-09-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
